import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import ReactMarkdown from'react-markdown';import'./Blog.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Blog=_ref=>{let{onClose}=_ref;const[posts,setPosts]=useState([]);const[selectedPost,setSelectedPost]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{// Fetch blog posts
const fetchPosts=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('/blogs/index.json');const data=await response.json();setPosts(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching blog posts:',error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchPosts();},[]);const loadPostContent=async postId=>{try{const response=await fetch(`/blogs/${postId}.md`);const content=await response.text();const post=posts.find(p=>p.id===postId);if(post){setSelectedPost({...post,content});}}catch(error){console.error('Error loading blog post:',error);}};if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-loading",children:"Loading blog posts..."})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Yash's Blog"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"close-button",onClick:onClose,children:"\xD7"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-content",children:selectedPost?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-post",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"back-button",onClick:()=>setSelectedPost(null),children:"\u2190 Back to Posts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:selectedPost.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"post-date",children:selectedPost.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"post-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReactMarkdown,{children:selectedPost.content})})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Recent Posts"}),posts.map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-preview",onClick:()=>loadPostContent(post.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"post-date",children:post.date})]},post.id))]})})]});};export default Blog;
